rows.label: qev041301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Rrrgh! It not fair! Even with all this wealth,
Warawa still can't get what she want![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Warawa HATE this, but not about to give up.
Still, humans are monsters for dreaming up such thing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev041301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Warawa what has her so upset.

rows.label: qev041301_JNK0020
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev041301_SEL0021
rows.name:
Express concern about what
humans have done to Warawa.

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0003
rows.name:
It just awful. No matter how many Warawa buy, only
bronze cards turn up. Warawa not even find silver![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0004
rows.name:
At this rate, Warawa go bankrupt before getting
precious gold nopopotamus card.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0005
rows.name:
Humans playing with feelings of Warawa.
Warawa buy and buy, but only get bronze cards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0006
rows.name:
Forget about precious gold nopopotamus cardâ€”
Warawa not even see silver. It is scam! Conspiracy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0007
rows.name:
Er, friend DOES know about popular Miralife Cards,
right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_JNK0030
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev041301_SEL0031
rows.name: Say you're not familiar with them.

rows.label: qev041301_JNK0040
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev041301_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Warawa that you've heard of them.

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0008
rows.name:
They are trading cards with pretty pictures of every fun
critter from Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Friend seriously behind times for not knowing about
them. These days, people young and old from every
race are obsessed with Miralife Cards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0010
rows.name:
There are many cards, from lame bronze, to shiny
silver, to super-ultra-mega-amazingly rare gold![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0011
rows.name:
...But it impossible to know what is inside until you
open pack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0012
rows.name:
Warawa has been buying up packs right and left in
effort to get adorable gold nopopotamus card.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0013
rows.name:
But no luck AT ALL! Warawa think maybe it time to
stop depending on luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0014
rows.name:
Perhaps friend can help Warawa with brilliant plan:
Operation Megatrade![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Wonderful! Love of Miralife Cards bring all sorts of
people together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0016
rows.name: As fellow fan, friend understands pain of Warawa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0017
rows.name:
So maybe friend will help Warawa with brilliant
plan: Operation Megatrade![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0018
rows.name:
Follow plan of Warawa, and friend can turn this
boring bronze blatta card into amazing gold
nopopotamus card![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0019
rows.name: Oh, thank you! Warawa explain straightaway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Big thrill of Miralife Cards is that no one knows
what they get until pack is open.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0021
rows.name:
So even this dumb bronze blatta card can be valuable
to friend that can't find it in pack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Which mean Warawa can make use of that to trade
for rarer and rarer cards...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0023
rows.name:
And finally end up with gold nopopotamus card!
See? Plan is foolproof.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev041301_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that it seems guaranteed to succeed.

rows.label: qev041301_JNK0060
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev041301_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that's the worst plan you've ever heard.

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0024
rows.name:
Warawa knew friend would agree! And once friend
gets gold nopopotamus card, Warawa will offer
huge reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Impossible to say unless friend tries!
...Also, it not Warawa doing the work,
so really no harm if whole thing fails.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0026
rows.name:
All right. Here is useless bronze blatta card.
Friend must get out there and trade, trade, trade![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0027
rows.name:
Card trades going well? Warawa very eager for
gold nopopotamus card, so chop-chop![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0028
rows.name: AAAAAAGH! Not ANOTHER bronze blatta card![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0029
rows.name:
This make 50 blattas! What is Warawa supposed
to do with all these?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0030
rows.name:
Please! Friend is only hope of Warawa! Get out there
and find gold nopopotamus card SOON![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0031
rows.name:
Th-that shine! That adorableness!
It is gold nopopotamus card![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0032
rows.name:
Warawa could swoon! Warawa could ride off into
dreamland on back of extremely shiny nopopotamus![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_JNK0070
rows.name: Stop

rows.label: qev041301_SEL0071
rows.name: Call Warawa back from her fantasies.

rows.label: qev041301_JNK0080
rows.name: Ignore

rows.label: qev041301_SEL0081
rows.name: Sit back and watch while Warawa rambles.

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0033
rows.name:
Let Warawa have this! It is glorious moment where
Warawa ride golden nopopotamus off to meet
dreamland prince![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0034
rows.name:
...Er, apologies. Warawa get sucked into
world of Miralife Cards while forgetting
friend who made it possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0035
rows.name:
Here is thanks, from bottom of heart of Warawa.
Friend should be able to trade it for something
amazing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0036
rows.name:
Ahh... Now beautiful princess Warawa will ride across
desert to waiting arms of prince in land of dreams...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0037
rows.name:
Journey will be hard, but trusty golden nopopotamus
always there to raise spirits of Warawa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0038
rows.name:
...Whew! Warawa just spend whole hour deep in
Miralife world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0039
rows.name:
Was friend as surprised as Warawa to learn that the
nopopotamus WAS the prince? And that he was
transformed by evil wizard?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0040
rows.name: ...Also, why does friend look so very tired?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041301_MSG0041
rows.name:
Warawa will give friend reward to cheer [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] up.
Friend should be able to trade it for something
amazing![ST:wait ]
